evals.prompt: Build me a document intelligence app where I can upload PDFs and see entities extracted as a knowledge graph
evals.expected_output: Creates Next.js app with PDF upload, Claude extraction API, force-directed graph Explorer, Firebase persistence
expectations: Creates app/api/extract/route.js with Claude API call
Creates components/Explorer.js with SVG graph rendering
Creates components/UploadScreen.js with PDF text extraction
Uses dark theme with gradient accents
Implements zoom/pan on the graph canvas

evals.prompt: I want to build a CLI that indexes a codebase into a knowledge graph and exposes it via MCP for Claude Code
evals.expected_output: Creates Node.js CLI with Tree-sitter AST parsing, knowledge graph builder, and MCP server with query/context/impact tools
expectations: Uses commander.js for CLI structure
Implements Tree-sitter AST parsing for JS/TS/Python
Extracts CALLS, IMPORTS, EXTENDS, DEFINES relationships
Creates MCP server with @modelcontextprotocol/sdk
Includes query, context, and impact tools
Shows Claude Code configuration example

evals.prompt: Help me build a skill graph system where I can create interconnected markdown files with wikilinks and have AI agents traverse them intelligently
evals.expected_output: Creates skill graph pipeline with wikilink parsing, YAML frontmatter extraction, MOC support, progressive disclosure traversal, and attention scoring
expectations: Parses [[wikilinks]] and [[target|alias]] syntax
Extracts YAML frontmatter with gray-matter
Supports MOCs (Maps of Content) as entry points
Implements 5-level progressive disclosure
Includes attention scoring for path ranking
Creates xplor skill init/validate/stats CLI commands

evals.prompt: I want to merge my codebase graph with my company documentation and engineering best practices into one queryable knowledge graph
evals.expected_output: Implements multi-domain fusion that merges code, document, and skill graphs with cross-domain edge detection
expectations: Fuses multiple graph types (code + docs + skills)
Handles ID collision with domain prefixes
Creates CROSS_DOMAIN edges for matching entity names
Supports xplor fuse CLI command
Shows fused graph with domain-colored regions in Explorer

evals.prompt: Create a therapy skill graph for CBT techniques that an AI agent can traverse
evals.expected_output: Scaffolds a CBT skill graph with MOCs, technique nodes, methodology claims, and framework nodes all connected with wikilinks
expectations: Creates index.md as root MOC
Creates technique nodes (cognitive-reframing, thought-records, etc.)
Uses YAML frontmatter with name, description, type, domain
Wikilinks woven into prose (not just link lists)
Includes cross-domain references where relevant
Validates with xplor skill validate
